snippet: A desert creature saved Bubba Watson at least a stroke in the Phoenix Open after his drive on the 13th went into a bush and tumbled into a burrowing animal’s hole.
abstract: Bubba Watson takes third-round lead at Phoenix Open; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: A desert creature saved Bubba Watson at least a stroke in the Phoenix Open after his drive on the 13th went into a bush and tumbled into a burrowing animal’s hole.

headline.main: Burrowing Animal Assists Watson at Phoenix Open
